actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means..

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to require states and local governments to hold public hearings in which interested individuals and neighborhood groups may participate in decisions with respect to the uses to be made of general revenue-sharing funds.

summary.text: Requires States and local governments to hold public hearings under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance in which interested individuals and neighborhood groups may participate in decisions with respect to the uses to be made of general revenue-sharing funds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to require states and local governments to hold public hearings in which interested individuals and neighborhood groups may participate in decisions with respect to the uses to be made of general revenue-sharing funds.
